approved_phrase_short: Serve the guest; the sale follows.
script_template_tokenized: A sale is not something you pursue; it’s what happens while you are immersed in serving others.
notes_for_training: Open the module with this mindset.

approved_phrase_short: Quick plan: questions → 2–3 options → you decide.
script_template_tokenized: Here’s what we’ll do: a few quick questions, then we’ll narrow to {num_options} best-fit options, and you decide what you want to see first.

approved_phrase_short: Let me make sure I got this right…
script_template_tokenized: Based on what you told me, your top priorities are {priority_1}, {priority_2}, and {priority_3}. Did I capture that right?

approved_phrase_short: Here’s why this matters for you…
script_template_tokenized: Because you mentioned {need}, this feature {feature} helps by {benefit}.

approved_phrase_short: How does that feel to you?
script_template_tokenized: How does that feel for your day-to-day—does that solve {concern_or_need}?

approved_phrase_short: This is the best match for what you told me.
script_template_tokenized: This option matches what you said matters most—{top_need_1} and {top_need_2}—so let’s start here.

approved_phrase_short: I have another option you may like even more.
script_template_tokenized: I have another option I think you might really like—especially since you mentioned {need}.

approved_phrase_short: Same needs + extra advantage.
script_template_tokenized: This one still covers {core_need} and adds {extra_benefit}, which might make it an even better fit.

approved_phrase_short: If you like it, it’s a rare combo.
script_template_tokenized: Just so you know, this {trim_color_package} combo is limited—if it fits, we can secure it while you decide.

approved_phrase_short: People like you choose this one.
script_template_tokenized: This is a popular choice for {customer_type} because it delivers {benefit_1} and {benefit_2}.

approved_phrase_short: That’s a fair concern—can I ask a quick question?
script_template_tokenized: I hear you—{objection}. Can I ask: is it more about {option_a} or {option_b}?

approved_phrase_short: If we solved X, are we good?
script_template_tokenized: If we can solve {barrier}, would you feel comfortable moving forward?

approved_phrase_short: I understand. Many felt that way. Here’s what they found…
script_template_tokenized: I understand how you feel. Many guests felt the same way about {topic} at first, but they found {reframe_value}.

approved_phrase_short: One clear price—so you can shop with confidence.
script_template_tokenized: We keep it simple with one clear price. Before I point you to the best option, what matters most in the vehicle?
notes_for_training: Use when guest goes straight to price.

approved_phrase_short: That makes sense—budget matters.
script_template_tokenized: I understand—staying within budget matters. Let’s look at {solution_path} so it feels comfortable.

approved_phrase_short: Here’s the answer—and why it helps you.
script_template_tokenized: Great question. The answer is {answer}. Since you mentioned {need}, that helps because {benefit}.

approved_phrase_short: I’m bringing in a specialist so you get the best answer.
script_template_tokenized: To make sure all your questions are answered clearly, I’m going to bring in {expert_role}—they’re great at {expertise_area}.

approved_phrase_short: I’ll stay with you.
script_template_tokenized: I’ll stay with you—this just adds another set of eyes to make sure we get this right.

approved_phrase_short: No need to repeat yourself.
script_template_tokenized: {team_member_name}, this is {guest_name}. They’re focused on {top_need} and had a question about {topic}.
notes_for_training: Best practice: guest doesn’t repeat story.

approved_phrase_short: I’m here to help, and I’m up to speed.
script_template_tokenized: Hi {guest_name}, I’m {name}. {salesperson_name} filled me in on what matters most to you, and I’m here to help with {topic}.

approved_phrase_short: Let’s add support to keep this easy.
script_template_tokenized: It feels like we’re close but something’s holding it up—let me bring in {role} so we can make this simple.

principle: Customer wants to leave (keep door open)
approved_phrase_short: No pressure—here’s the easiest next step.
script_template_tokenized: I completely respect that. If you’d like, I can text/email you the top {num_options} options we discussed so you can review at your pace.

approved_phrase_short: Peace of mind for you and your family.
script_template_tokenized: Since safety is a top priority, this {feature} is designed to {benefit}—so you feel confident every time you drive.

approved_phrase_short: Easy, modern, connected.
script_template_tokenized: If you like tech, you’ll love how {feature} makes {use_case} simple—want to try it?
notes_for_training: Demo then hand control to guest.

approved_phrase_short: Capability that matches your lifestyle.
script_template_tokenized: For what you described—{use_case}—this {feature} gives you {benefit} without extra hassle.

approved_phrase_short: Let’s keep this simple.
script_template_tokenized: To keep this simple, I’m going to show you {num_options} best fits, and you tell me which one feels right.

approved_phrase_short: You’re making a smart, informed choice.
script_template_tokenized: Based on your priorities—{priority_1}, {priority_2}, {priority_3}—this checks the boxes. How close does this feel to ‘perfect’?
